  • Element
cc.acquized.annotationsx.command.annotations

Annotation Type Command


  • @Target(value=METHOD)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Command
    Marks a Method as Command Method. The Method will then be called (if registered) by the CommandManager if somebody on the Server executed the Command
    Since:
    Annotations 2.0
    Author:
    Acquized, minnymin3

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String name
      The Name of the Command.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String[] aliases
      A List of Aliases of the Command.
      String description
      The Description of the Command.
      boolean inGameOnly
      A Boolean dedicated to if the Command can only be executed from Players The Name is missleading - it may be replaced with playersOnly();
      String noPermissions
      The Message sent to the CommandSender if he tries to execute the Command but doesn't has Permissions for it.
      String notInGame
      The Message sent to the CommandSender if he tries to execute the Command but isn't a Player.
      String permission
      The Permission required to execute this Command.
      String usage
      The Usage of the Command.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract String name
        The Name of the Command. The Command will be registered as /[name]
        Returns:
        Name of the Command

      • description

        public abstract String description
        The Description of the Command. This will be registered in /help
        Returns:
        Description of the Command - can be empty
        Default:
        ""

      • aliases

        public abstract String[] aliases
        A List of Aliases of the Command. If a alias is executed, the method will still be called (even if the method isn't the command's name)
        Returns:
        A List of Aliases of the Command - can be empty
        Default:
        ""

      • permission

        public abstract String permission
        The Permission required to execute this Command. Leave empty for No Permission required.
        Returns:
        The Permission required to execute this Command - can be empty
        Default:
        ""

      • noPermissions

        public abstract String noPermissions
        The Message sent to the CommandSender if he tries to execute the Command but doesn't has Permissions for it.
        Returns:
        The Message sent to the CommandSender if tries to execute, but has no permission.
        Default:
        "You don\'t have Permission to execute this Command."

      • usage

        public abstract String usage
        The Usage of the Command. Will be displayed as syntax if command syntax failed. This will be registered in /help
        Returns:
        The Syntax Pattern of the Command - can be empty
        Default:
        ""

      • inGameOnly

        public abstract boolean inGameOnly
        A Boolean dedicated to if the Command can only be executed from Players The Name is missleading - it may be replaced with playersOnly();
        Returns:
        a Boolean set to true if only executeable from In-Game Players
        Default:
        false

      • notInGame

        public abstract String notInGame
        The Message sent to the CommandSender if he tries to execute the Command but isn't a Player.
        Returns:
        The Message sent to the CommandSender if tries to execute, but is not a Player.
        Default:
        "This command is only executable from In-Game."
